amendment.description: Amendment requires States to establish procedures under which they will withhold, suspend, or restrict State-issued licenses (including driver's, professional, and occupational licenses) of persons who are delinquent in making court-ordered child support payments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require states to establish procedures under which they would withhold, suspend, or restrict the state-issued licenses (including driver's, professional, and occupational licenses) of persons who are delinquent in making court-ordered child support payments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 5 (Roll no. 265).
